Hi #Rstats,#ggplot2 #rspatial  twitter. Want to quickly get colors for your plots and maps? I use palette_explorer() by Martijn Tennekes. With this function you call an awesome shiny app that lets you choose colors for different cases and provides the corresponding code. Outtake: https://t.co/9RkdI8CKb7
